tool_description: GraphQL implementation for most popular Giphy endpoints.
name: Giphy GraphQL
title: Giphy GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://giphy-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giphy-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://giphy-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giphy-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
